newsitem.title: MACEDONIA: Macedonia to complete privatisation soon.
newsitem.headline: Macedonia to complete privatisation soon.

text.p: Macedonia will complete its privatisation programme within months, government sources told Reuters on Tuesday.
According to the official statistics, 866 firms worth more than two billion German marks and employing 133,603 people were sold since the first transaction two years ago.
The republic's Agency for Privatisation is preparing the sale of another 312 firms worth 2.2 billion German marks (DM) with over 150,000 employed.
Thanks to the programme 114 enterprises worth 877 million DM are now owned by management teams. Very little of those were sold to foreign buyers.
"The unfavourable climate caused a very marginal presence of foreign investment in Macedonia," ther source said.
Foreign investment in the republic in 1995 stood at $30 million and was mostly invested in small and medium size firms. -- Mircela Casule, Skopje newsroom ++389 91 201 196
